title: Soft Baked Chocolate Chunk Cookies
desc: Our signature gluten-free & allergy-friendly Chocolate Chip cookies are now soft-baked. Made with better-for-you ingredients and only 2.5 grams of sugar per cookie, this new take on a classic is full of chewy, chocolatey flavor.

title: Soft Baked Cookie Butter Cookies
desc: These soft and spiced cookies will warm any day. Gluten-free and allergy-friendly, enjoy sweet and buttery cookies full of everything you want in a snack and nothing you don't.

title: Soft Baked Pumpkin Pie Cookies
desc: Our limited edition fam favorite is back! These spiced, soft-baked cookies will warm any fall day. Like all things Partake, these cookies are gluten-free, vegan, allergy-friendly, and non-GMO.

title: Crunchy Chocolate Chip Cookies
desc: The icon. The classic. The Chocolate Chip cookie! One taste of these vegan, allergy-friendly & non-GMO cookies prove why it's cookie time, all the time.

title: Crunchy Oatmeal Carrot Cake Cookies
desc: This cookie takes the (carrot) cake! Literally. Packed with delicious flavor from carrots, oats, cinnamon, and rosemary, these vegan, allergy-friendly & non-GMO cookies are truly crave-worthy.

title: Crunchy Birthday Cake Cookies
desc: Surprise! It’s a birthday cake cookie you can feel great about—birthday or not. These vegan, allergy-friendly & non-GMO cookies are the gifts that keep on giving.
